Member Enumeration Documentation

enum GRaySelectTraversal::Method

Enumeration values:
BY_BBOX  
BY_BBOX_SCREEN  
BY_OBJECT  
BY_OBJECT_SCREEN  

enum GRaySelectTraversal::Mode

Enumeration values:
MODE_SELECTION   normal mouse selection (pscreen is valid).
MODE_RAYHIT   some world ray.
MODE_COLLISION   RAY collision detection.
MODE_RAPID   Rapid collision detection.
MODE_RAPID_RECURSIVE   Rapid recursive collision detection between 2 objects.

int GRaySelectTraversal::CheckForHitByBox (GNode * n, BBox & box, GHitInfo & hit, RayRange & tRay)

Return Code >0, hit detected hit info updated with hit data (m,anchor, bbox, inline ... tRay contains global ray transformed to local coordinates
